/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, showcasing the architectural prowess of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the blend of nature and concrete in the cityscape.
